thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfy pleasant stopover
thread.title_full: Comfy pleasant stopover - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: happyshopper65
title: Comfy pleasant stopover
text: A decent sized room, clean, comfortable and well laid out. We were pleasantly surprised at how much room there was. It was quiet despite being in the heart of Brixton. Breakfast was superb. A hairdryer was supplied in the room and the light around the mirror was very useful.
